title: Lasers: an introduction
brief_description: Principles of laser operation are illustrated, including concepts of coherent and incoherent light, continuous and discrete spectra, stimulation of atoms, and resonance. Gaseous and crystalline lasers are shown to be valuable tools of holography, communications, medicine and industry.
